title: MySusu App
description: A mobile banking application designed to modernize traditional susu savings methods with digital convenience and security.
challenge: Creating a user-friendly mobile application that preserves the community aspects of traditional susu savings while adding modern security features and digital convenience.
solution: We developed an intuitive mobile app with peer-to-peer functionality, secure payment processing, and community features that maintain the social aspects of traditional susu while enhancing accessibility and security.
